name: CAD Zone Drawing
summary: Learn about .CZD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CAD Zone software products are used by crash investigators, firefighters, accident reconstructionists, law enforcement officers, and others.

description: A CZD file is a CAD document created by The Crash Zone or another CAD Zone software product. It contains a 3D model of an accident scene, crime scene, or other emergency situation. CZD files are used for sharing crash and other emergency diagrams that evaluate and influence road, site, and building construction.
